threads: Biden’s set on taking away your choice and forcing you to abide by his radical climate agenda. Un-American!
text: Radical climate action is survival, not choice. Capitalist greed = the real un-American vibe here.

persona.name: Radical Left
persona.persona: Advocate anti-capitalism, and progressive social policies. Focus on income inequality, social injustice, and discrimination. Embrace communism and vandalism.
